Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a wide highway running east and west through the Land of Mordor.
Room.LongDescription: A great forest stands on the north side. Dry, hot sand is to the south. The road rises and falls as it covers small hills rolling toward the east. The eastern cities of the Land of Mordor are far away. Oceancrest is much closer to the west.
